ValidationRule.description: The Scope_Indicator__c must be either 1 (Global), 3 (Profile), 4 (Role), or 5 (User Specific)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Invalid value for Scope Indicator. Must be set to 1 if a Global setting, 3 if a Profile Specific setting, 4 if Role Specific, or 5 if a User Specific setting.
